item.text: So they came to the other side of the lake, to the region of the Gerasenes.

Just as <st data-num="846" class="">Jesus</st><n id="1" /> was <st data-num="1831">getting out</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="4143">boat</st>,<n id="2" /> a <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">with</st> an <st data-num="169" class="">unclean</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">spirit</st><n id="3" /> came <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="3419" class="">tombs</st> and <st data-num="5221" class="">met</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.<n id="4" />

<st data-num="3739">He</st> <st data-num="2731 2192">lived</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> the <st data-num="3418" class="">tombs</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3762">no one</st> <st data-num="1410" class="">could</st> <st data-num="1210" class="">bind</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="3765">anymore</st>, <st data-num="3761">not even</st> with a <st data-num="254" class="">chain</st>.

<st data-num="1223" class="">For</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> hands <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> feet had <st data-num="4178" class="">often</st> been <st data-num="1210" class="">bound</st> with <st data-num="254" class="">chains</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3976" class="">shackles</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">but</st><n id="2" /> he had <st data-num="1288" class="">torn</st> the <st data-num="254" class="">chains</st> apart <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4937" class="">broken</st> the <st data-num="3976" class="">shackles</st> <st data-num="4937" class="">in pieces</st>. <st data-num="3762">No one</st> was <st data-num="2480" class="">strong enough</st> to <st data-num="1150" class="">subdue</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

<st data-num="1223" class="">Each</st> <st data-num="3571" class="">night</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">every</st> <st data-num="2250" class="">day</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> the <st data-num="3418" class="">tombs</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="3735" class="">mountains</st>, he <st data-num="1510" class="">would</st> <st data-num="2896">cry out</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2629" class="">cut</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">himself</st> with <st data-num="3037" class="">stones</st>.

When he <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> a <st data-num="3113" class="">distance</st>, he <st data-num="5143" class="">ran</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4352">bowed down</st> before <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="2896">cried out</st> with a <st data-num="3173" class="">loud</st> <st data-num="5456" class="">voice</st>, “Leave <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> alone,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>, <st data-num="5207" class="">Son</st> of the <st data-num="5310">Most High</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>! I <st data-num="3726" class="">implore</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> by <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st><n id="3" />—do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="928" class="">torment</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>!”

(<st data-num="1063">For</st> Jesus<n id="1" /> had <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="1831">Come out</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">of</st> that <st data-num="444" class="">man</st>, you <st data-num="169" class="">unclean</st> <st data-num="4151" class="">spirit!”)</st><n id="2" />

Jesus<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1905" class="">asked</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="5101" class="">What</st> is <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st>?” <st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> he <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="1473">My</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st> is <st data-num="3003" class="">Legion</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">for</st> we <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st>.”

He <st data-num="3870" class="">begged</st> <st data-num="846" class="">Jesus</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="4183" class="">repeatedly</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="2443">to</st> <st data-num="649" class="">send</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="1854" class="">out</st> of the <st data-num="5561" class="">region</st>.

<st data-num="1563" class="">There</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="3735" class="">hillside</st>,<n id="1" /> a <st data-num="3173" class="">great</st> <st data-num="34" class="">herd</st> of <st data-num="5519" class="">pigs</st> <st data-num="1510">was</st> <st data-num="1006" class="">feeding</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> the demonic spirits<n id="1" /> <st data-num="3870" class="">begged</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="3992">Send</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="5519" class="">pigs</st>. Let us <st data-num="1525" class="">enter</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>.”
Jesus gave them permission. So the unclean spirits came out and went into the pigs. Then the herd rushed down the steep slope into the lake, and about 2,000 were drowned in the lake.
Now the herdsmen ran off and spread the news in the town and countryside, and the people went out to see what had happened.

They <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2334" class="">saw</st> the <st data-num="1139" class="">demon-possessed man</st> <st data-num="2521" class="">sitting</st> there, <st data-num="2439" class="">clothed</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> in <st data-num="4993">his right mind</st>—the one who <st data-num="2192" class="">had</st> the “<st data-num="3003">Legion</st>”—<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they were <st data-num="5399" class="">afraid</st>.

Those who had <st data-num="1492" class="">seen</st> <st data-num="4459" class="">what</st> had <st data-num="1096" class="">happened</st> to the <st data-num="1139" class="">demon-possessed man</st> <st data-num="1334" class="">reported</st> it, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> they also told <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> the <st data-num="5519" class="">pigs</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> they <st data-num="757">began</st> to <st data-num="3870">beg</st> <st data-num="846" class="">Jesus</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="565" class="">leave</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="3725" class="">region</st>.

As <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> was <st data-num="1684" class="">getting</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="4143" class="">boat</st> the man who had been <st data-num="1139" class="">demon-possessed</st> <st data-num="3870" class="">asked</st> <st data-num="2443" class="">if</st> <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> could <st data-num="1510" class="">go</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3326" class="">with</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">But</st><n id="1" /> Jesus<n id="2" /> did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="863" class="">permit</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> to do so. <st data-num="235" class="">Instead</st>, he <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “<st data-num="5217">Go</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3624" class="">home</st> and <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="4674" class="">your</st> people <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="518" class="">tell</st> <st data-num="846" class="">them</st> <st data-num="3745" class="">what</st> the <st data-num="2962" class="">Lord</st> has <st data-num="4160" class="">done</st> for <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">that</st> he <st data-num="1653">had mercy on</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.”
So he went away and began to proclaim in the Decapolis what Jesus had done for him, and all were amazed.
When Jesus had crossed again in a boat to the other side, a large crowd gathered around him, and he was by the sea.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1520" class="">one</st> of the <st data-num="752">synagogue leaders</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3686" class="">named</st> <st data-num="2383" class="">Jairus</st>,<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2064">came up</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> when he <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="846" class="">Jesus</st>,<n id="4" /> he <st data-num="4098" class="">fell</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">at</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="4228" class="">feet</st>.

He <st data-num="3870" class="">asked</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">urgently</st>, “<st data-num="1473">My</st> <st data-num="2365">little daughter</st> is <st data-num="2079">near death</st>. <st data-num="2064" class="">Come</st> and <st data-num="2007" class="">lay</st> your <st data-num="5495" class="">hands</st> on <st data-num="846" class="">her</st> <st data-num="2443">so that</st> she may be <st data-num="4982" class="">healed</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2198" class="">live</st>.”
Jesus went with him, and a large crowd followed and pressed around him.
Now a woman was there who had been suffering from a hemorrhage for 12 years.

She had <st data-num="3958" class="">endured</st> a <st data-num="4183" class="">great deal</st> <st data-num="5259" class="">under</st> the care of <st data-num="4183" class="">many</st> <st data-num="2395" class="">doctors</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> had <st data-num="1159" class="">spent</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="3588">that</st> <st data-num="846">she</st> had. <st data-num="235" class="">Yet</st> <st data-num="3123" class="">instead</st> of <st data-num="5623">getting better</st>, she <st data-num="2064" class="">grew</st> <st data-num="5501" class="">worse</st>.

When she <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> <st data-num="4012" class="">about</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>, she <st data-num="2064">came up</st> <st data-num="3693" class="">behind</st> him <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="3793" class="">crowd</st> and <st data-num="681">touched</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2440" class="">cloak</st>,<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> she kept <st data-num="3004" class="">saying</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="1437">If</st> <st data-num="2579" class="">only</st> I <st data-num="681">touch</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2440" class="">clothes</st>, I will be <st data-num="4982" class="">healed</st>.”<n id="2" />

<st data-num="2117">At once</st> the <st data-num="4077 129">bleeding</st> <st data-num="3583" class="">stopped</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> she <st data-num="1097" class="">felt</st> in her <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> she was <st data-num="2390" class="">healed</st> <st data-num="575" class="">of</st> her <st data-num="3148" class="">disease</st>.

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="1921" class="">knew</st> <st data-num="2117">at once</st> that <st data-num="1411" class="">power</st> had <st data-num="1831">gone out</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>. He <st data-num="1994">turned around</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="3793" class="">crowd</st> and <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="5101">Who</st> <st data-num="681">touched</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="2440" class="">clothes</st>?”

<st data-num="846" class="">His</st> <st data-num="3101" class="">disciples</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, “You <st data-num="991" class="">see</st> the <st data-num="3793" class="">crowd</st> <st data-num="4918">pressing against</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> you <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st>, ‘<st data-num="5101">Who</st> <st data-num="680" class="">touched</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me?’</st>”

<st data-num="2532" class="">But</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="4017">looked around</st> to <st data-num="1492" class="">see</st> who had <st data-num="4160" class="">done</st> <st data-num="3778" class="">it</st>.

<st data-num="1161" class="">Then</st> the <st data-num="1135" class="">woman</st>, with <st data-num="5399" class="">fear</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="5141" class="">trembling</st>, <st data-num="1492" class="">knowing</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> had <st data-num="1096" class="">happened</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">her</st>, <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4363">fell down before</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3004">told</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> the <st data-num="3956" class="">whole</st> <st data-num="225" class="">truth</st>.
He said to her, “Daughter, your faith has made you well. Go in peace, and be healed of your disease.”
While he was still speaking, people came from the synagogue leader’s house saying, “Your daughter has died. Why trouble the teacher any longer?”

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st>, <st data-num="3878">paying no attention</st> to <st data-num="3056">what</st> was <st data-num="2980" class="">said</st>, <st data-num="3004" class="">told</st> the <st data-num="752">synagogue leader</st>, “Do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> be <st data-num="5399" class="">afraid;</st> <st data-num="3441">just</st> <st data-num="4100" class="">believe</st>.”

He did <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="863" class="">let</st> <st data-num="3762" class="">anyone</st> <st data-num="4870" class="">follow</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="1508">except</st> <st data-num="4074" class="">Peter</st>, <st data-num="2385" class="">James</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2491" class="">John</st>, the <st data-num="80" class="">brother</st> of <st data-num="2385" class="">James</st>.

They <st data-num="2064" class="">came</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="3624" class="">house</st> of the <st data-num="752">synagogue leader</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">where</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="2334" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="2351">noisy confusion</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> people <st data-num="2799" class="">weeping</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="214" class="">wailing</st> <st data-num="4183" class="">loudly</st>.<n id="2" />

When he <st data-num="1525" class="">entered</st> he <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="846" class="">them</st>, “<st data-num="5101">Why</st> are you <st data-num="2350" class="">distressed</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2799" class="">weeping</st>? The <st data-num="3813" class="">child</st> is <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="599" class="">dead</st> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="2518" class="">asleep</st>!”

<st data-num="2532" class="">And</st> they began <st data-num="2606">making fun</st> of <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> he <st data-num="1544" class="">forced</st> them <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> outside,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">he</st> <st data-num="3880" class="">took</st> the <st data-num="3813" class="">child’s</st> <st data-num="3962" class="">father</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3384" class="">mother</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> own <st data-num="3588 3326">companions</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1531" class="">went into</st> the room <st data-num="3699" class="">where</st> the <st data-num="3813" class="">child</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st>.<n id="4" />
Then, gently taking the child by the hand, he said to her, “Talitha koum,” which means, “Little girl, I say to you, get up.”

The <st data-num="2877" class="">girl</st> <st data-num="450" class="">got up</st> <st data-num="2117" class="">at once</st> and began to <st data-num="4043">walk around</st> (she <st data-num="1510" class="">was</st> <st data-num="1427" class="">twelve</st> <st data-num="2094" class="">years</st> old). They were <st data-num="1611 3173">completely</st> <st data-num="1839" class="">astonished</st> at this.<n id="1" />
He strictly ordered that no one should know about this, and told them to give her something to eat.
